If this post isn't ok then just tell me, ok? :)

* As quickly as she could with the added weight Iron pulled the body of Hell 
Drak into the ceiling, disappearing into the shadows...though a couple of 
the sent charges had found their mark. Leaving her back leg numb and almost 
useless. < Clever...but not enough...> she thought as she tried to get a 
better hold of her prey.
Hell Drak would be looking right into the face of a blue eyed monster if she 
cared to look; though no harm would come to her.
Quickly IR passed through the ceiling and off into another hall completely, 
one arm wrapped around Hell Drak and the other three used for movement.
She pushed past and bunch of copper wiring that sparked as she passed, 
making her ghastly form look even MORE deadly and frightening before she 
stopped and looked at Hell Drak. A smile creeping over her lips, baring 
wickedly sharp teeth.*

" If this was real, you would be in my stomach by now."

* Her black tongue ran over silver fangs, leaving drops of acidic saliva to 
drop and sizzle.*

" And I wouldn't think twice about it either."

*Iron then let go of Hell Drak, moving so that she would be sitting back on 
her haunches.*

" You've underestimated me. That's mistake #1.   #2 Is that, if you would 
have looked before shot...you were seriously overpowered. #3...the odds are 
against you.  These are the things that happen in real battles.  
Everything's unpredictable and looks are deceiving.
This is a dirty war, remember that."

* So with that she stood up and shock, looking down through the ceiling.*

" Plus my species doesn't take prisoners so youï¿½re out. Dead.  Maybe you can 
find a battle simulation to tie you over until we're through here.
Have fun."

* Seconds later she was gone, through a near by vent in a flash of black. 
Heading south towards the radioactive waste again.*
